briefTitle: Adenosine Effect on Persistent Pulmonary Vein Isolation Line Evaluation (APPLE Trial)
officialTitle: Adenosine Effect on Persistent Pulmonary Vein Isolation Line Evaluation (APPLE Trial)
summary: The investigators studied the effects of adenosine on the reconnection rate after successful pulmonary veins isolation by radiofrequency catheter ablation in patients with drug-resistant atrial fibrillation

primaryOutcome.measure: Reconnection of Pulmonary Vein Electrogram After Adenosine Infusion
